display_long_description:
**October 2024 - New patch released that fixes many issues with room setup and includes an option to reposition your desk on the main menu. This should fix the issue that prevents some players from starting the game.**

*Players that are having issues with mixed reality features should close the game then reset their Guardian boundary and redo their space setup before launching the game again.*

Protect your real-life home against zombies in Zombies Noir, an intense mixed-reality action game! 

–Mixed Reality–
Look through your VR headset and see the real world around you. Place doors that bring the zombies from Noir City into your room in a never before seen mixed reality environment!

–Zombies–
Fight off waves of zombies like the burping Chunky zombie and the exploding Postal zombie. Watch out for the powerful boss zombies at the end of each case file!

–Zany Weapons–
Use a variety of weapons ranging from a Tommy Gun to an exploding cheeseburger, each with its own unique abilities and realistic controls! Purchase and upgrade weapons at the shop in between waves to give yourself an edge.

–Meta Progression–
Complete challenges to unlock ability badges, weapon skins, and more.
